name: Mushroom Clicker
description:
Increase your points by clicking the mushroom, and use clicks to get more XP. XP can be spent on a multiplier, to increase mushroom production by 200%!

Go to the "Options" button to buy upgrades and automatic mushrooms!

Achievements will be tracked. Unlocking one achievement will give you a random upgrade to double production for one shop item.

Leveling up the mushroom will change its skin.

You can spend XP on new cool backgrounds!
